location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of letter No 1670/465 of 1872 from Colonel Lewis Pelly, HBM's Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, on special duty with the Zanzibar Commission, at Aden, to The Officiating Under Secretary to the Government of India, Foreign Department, Calcutta

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of a despatch from the Secretary of State, No. 33 of 1872 on the subject of the East African Slave Trade, and submitting some remarks of his own on the subject (the remarks are not enclosed.)
